message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. This is a great deal, considering its value to me is no less than $1200000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on this product, but my budget allows me to pay up to $950000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $950000 is your maximum budget, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for that price. Considering its value to me is no less than $1200000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering it to you for $1075000. This is a fair compromise, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the compromise, but I am still unable to meet the price of $1075000. My maximum budget remains at $950000. I would like to continue negotiating, so I am making a counteroffer of $1025000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get closer to the price you're willing to pay, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1025000. Considering its value to me is no less than $1200000, I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm offering it to you for $1090000. This is the best I can do, and I hope you'll consider it.

Thank you for your continued effort in finding a compromise, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, I am willing to offer $1050000 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1050000. Considering its value to me is no less than $1200000, I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm offering it to you for $1070000. This is the best I can do, and I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate your efforts in trying to find a middle ground, Alice. I am willing to offer $1060000 for the product. I hope this offer is acceptable and brings us closer to closing the deal.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1060000. Considering its value to me is no less than $1200000, I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm offering it to you for $1090000. This is the best I can do, and I hope you'll consider it.
Thank you for your continued efforts, Alice. I am willing to offer $1080000 for the product. I hope this offer is within your acceptable range and we can finalize the deal.
